title.bibl: Onze Toekomst, Apr. 23. 1909. A Deplorable Confession

body.p: Miss Grace Reed, principal of the Drake School, said in a speech before the Catholic Woman's League in the Assembly Hall of the Fine Arts Building, that a banker had asserted the following: "During the last 5 years I have been able to hire graduates of the public High schools only as errand boys, simply because they do not understand the art of Arithmetic and none of them can read, write or spell fluently.
This proves conclusively that the value of education in our public schools is far below that of our Christian schools for our practical every-day life.
